title: Thermodynamo Axe
content:
Thermodynamo Axe Rare 2~11 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d10 (1d8)+1 Slashing Thermodynamo: Whenever you deal damage with this weapon, you gain 2 turns of Heat. Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Designed by gnomish innovation, this weapon has a dynamic core that swivels and tinkles into life whenever the axe is swung at a foe. Battleaxe Versatile 1.8 310
